entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
